short.ar: Crazy Runner هي لعبة أركيد مجنونة ومليئة بالإثارة حيث يتعين عليك الركض على الطريق والقفز فوق السيارات والقنابل والإطارات.
short.am: እብድ ሯጭ በመንገድ ላይ መሮጥ ፣ መኪናዎችን ፣ ቦምቦችን እና ጎማዎችን መዝለል ያለብዎት እብድ እና አድሬናሊን የተሞላ የመጫወቻ ማዕከል ጨዋታ ነው።
short.bg: Crazy Runner е луда и изпълнена с адреналин аркадна игра, в която трябва да бягате по пътя, да прескачате коли, бомби и гуми.

short.ca: Crazy Runner és un joc d'arcade boig i ple d'adrenalina on has de córrer per la carretera, saltar per sobre de cotxes,…
short.cs: Crazy Runner je bláznivá a adrenalinová arkádová hra, kde musíte běhat po silnici, skákat přes auta, bomby a pneumatiky.
short.da: Crazy Runner er et skørt og adrenalinfyldt arkadespil, hvor du skal løbe på vejen, hoppe over biler, bomber og dæk.

short.he: Crazy Runner הוא משחק ארקייד מטורף ומלא אדרנלין שבו אתה צריך לרוץ על הכביש, לקפוץ מעל מכוניות, פצצות וצמיגים.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crazy Runner is a crazy and adrenaline-filled arcade game where you have to run on the road, jump over cars, bombs and tires.

A normal runner would say it's "impossible" to run on the highway during rush hour, but for the Crazy Runner, anything is possible. He's not afraid to hit the traffic fast, but he needs your help to get past the cars, bombs and other obstacles that will come his way.

How To Play:

Be careful, different obstacles may come your way at any time. Get help from the left mouse button to overcome the obstacles, make sure you set each jump correctly. Because one wrong move means the end of the game.
This game is designed for adrenaline lovers who prefer to talk. If you consider yourself a fearless adventurer, you should definitely try Crazy Runner.


Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Crazy Runner - Car game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@zillakgames.com and share your thoughts and problems.
